title: Gallipoli
creator_credit: George I. Malcolm, J McGrath, Frank Hunter, ABC and Supreme Sound Studios
brief_description: A recreation of the futile attempt to capture the straits of Bosphorous in 1915 in order to gain control of Constantinople. Shows the needles loss of life, caused by the poor command of Gallipoli, Cape Helles and Suvla Bay. Makes use of documentary footage. Suitable for secondary level.
